name: save.exe
description:
Something doesn't seem right with this game...

A tiny corruption left to persist in the save file, growing and growing.

Description

Save.exe is an action-horror short game with an 8-bit theme. The game is set in medieval times, with the protagonist tasked with defeating evil and saving the princess, but with a twist. With 3 levels and various monsters to triumph over, Save.exe will keep you on the edge of your seat throughout its runtime. 

Instructions
  • Arrow keys – Moving the protagonist
  • A key – Jump
  • S key – Change dialogues
  • D key – Attack
Group

Platform Warriors

  1. Arif
  2. Anush
  3. Jie Feng
  4. Thuya

Made during NUS GDG Gamecraft 2019.
